data.subject: Payment Reminder - {{account_name}}
data.body:
Payment Reminder

Dear {{account_name}},

We hope this message finds you well. We wanted to reach out regarding your account with us.

Our records indicate that you have {{invoice_count}} invoice(s) with a total outstanding balance of {{total_outstanding}}.

Invoice Details:

{{invoice_details}}

We understand that sometimes payments can be delayed due to various circumstances. If you have already sent payment, please disregard this notice. If not, we would appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

If you have any questions about these invoices or need to discuss payment arrangements, please don't hesitate to contact our accounts receivable team.

Thank you for your business and prompt attention to this matter.

Best regards,
Accounts Receivable Team
Fineman West

This is an automated reminder. Date: {{current_date}}
